subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Darwin and God: The Real Story
description: Learn Darwin and God: The Real Story in one minute.

hook.text: Darwin wasn't an atheist. He struggled with faith his whole life. Evolution's father had a complex bond with God.

buildup.text: Darwin studied theology at Cambridge. His wife was devout. He delayed publishing for 20 years, partly from fear.

discovery.text: What shook Darwin's faith wasn't evolution but the death of his daughter Annie in 1851. Grief, not science, broke him.

twist.text: Darwin called himself an agnostic, not an atheist. He said the question of God was too great for the human intellect.

climax.text: Using Darwin as proof that science kills faith misrepresents him. His doubt was personal, not a simple rejection.

punchline.text: Darwin lost faith over grief, not science. His doubt was deeply personal.

quiz.question: What most shook Darwin's religious faith?
options: The death of his daughter Annie
